title: concord chase
posting_body: Concord Chase offers our residents quality housing in a central location, connecting you to all of the shopping and dining Smyrna has to offer.
You will be able to kick back and relax poolside on our spacious sundeck or get active in our updated fitness center.

Living in between Atlanta & Marietta, you will enjoy many features that you just can't find in the city, such as lawn space for your four-legged friends, a resident-only swimming pool, a private gym, a playground and a STEM Georgia certified school district.
Our 2, 3 & 4 Bedroom apartments boast wood-style flooring, washer & dryer connections, ceramic tile shower surrounds, and we welcome cats & dogs (additional fees may be charged, no weight limit).
Our friendly and knowledgeable staff is more than happy to help out with anything related to leasing.
If you call Concord Chase home, visit the Resident Portal; otherwise, give us a call or send us an email and receive a timely response to any question you might have.
If you’ve been searching for an excellent 2, 3 or 4 bedroom apartment in Smyrna that's sophisticated and conveniently located, your search ends at Concord Chase.
Stop in and have a no-strings-attached look around the property to check us out!
